body_html:
@ShapingView : To convert a saved model use tflite_convert:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/g3doc/cmdline_examples.md#savedmodel

In fact the commandline is much simpler :) since saved model has inputs and outputs.
tflite_convert --saved_model_dir=export/ -output_file=export/optimized_graph.lite

I was able to convert your graph using the command, btw do you want the output to be z instead of y.
body_text:
@ShapingView : To convert a saved model use tflite_convert:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/g3doc/cmdline_examples.md#savedmodel
In fact the commandline is much simpler :) since saved model has inputs and outputs.
tflite_convert  --saved_model_dir=export/   -output_file=export/optimized_graph.lite
I was able to convert your graph using the command, btw do you want the output to be z instead of y.
body:
@ShapingView : To convert a saved model use tflite_convert:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/g3doc/cmdline_examples.md#savedmodel

In fact the commandline is much simpler :) since saved model has inputs and outputs.
tflite_convert  --saved_model_dir=export/   -output_file=export/optimized_graph.lite

I was able to convert your graph using the command, btw do you want the output to be z instead of y.
